title: Principal Data Architect
content:
As a Principal Data Architect at Thoughtworks, we are dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment that values diverse perspectives and backgrounds. In this role, you will play a key part in developing modern data architecture approaches to meet key business objectives and provide end-to-end data solutions. You might spend time with a new client on a deep technical review or organizational review, aiding them in unlocking the potential of data to address their most pressing problems. Your contributions will extend to helping clients design scalable architecture and providing technical leadership to our teams.

Job responsibilities


You will consult on complex data programs, synchronizing cross-cutting data architectural concerns.
You will provide client-facing technical leadership and guidance on topics related to data architecture, engineering, and analytics to advise clients on bringing their data strategy to life.
You will lead and interact with clients across various domains, addressing a spectrum of challenging problems.
You will collaborate with diverse teams engaged in the program, connecting their work with the broader data strategy.
You will ensure effective communication and alignment between architects, engineers, decision-makers, and business stakeholders.
You will communicate both high-level and low-level technical details of data architecture to engineers and business stakeholders.
You will be responsible for data governance, data security, and data privacy to support business and compliance requirements.
You will seamlessly incorporate data quality into day-to-day work and the delivery process.
You will develop your career outside traditional paths by focusing on your passion rather than a predetermined one-size-fits-all plan.
You will represent Thoughtworks in various online and offline forums, including events and conferences.


Job qualifications

Technical Skills


You have experience in providing advisory and consultative guidance for clients and cross-delivery teams.
You have a track record in demonstrating innovation and expertise in data architectures, technology alternatives, data strategy, governance, security, and other data-related concerns.
You have experience in utilizing data-driven solutions with a deep understanding of data modeling and experience with tools/platforms like Kafka, Spark, Hadoop, and more.
You have experience in developing real-time and low-latency data streaming solutions.
You have a track record of ensuring proper data governance policies, including data lineage, quality checks, and classification.
You have experience with productionise machine learning models and apply data security strategy to solve business problems.
You are excited about data infrastructure and operations, with familiarity working in cloud environments.


Professional Skills


You have strong problem-solving and consulting skills.
You have a track record with stakeholder management, fostering collaboration between clients and key stakeholders.
You are resilient in ambiguous situations, adapting roles to address challenges from multiple perspectives.
You enjoy coaching, mentoring, and motivating others while promoting technical excellence and openness to change.
You have a track record of proven leadership, encouraging professional development and building strong partnerships.
You have the expertise in one of the specific domains, such as automotive, healthcare, retail, life sciences, financial services, or public sector.



Other things to know

Learning & Development

There is no one-size-fits-all career path at Thoughtworks: however you want to develop your career is entirely up to you. But we also balance autonomy with the strength of our cultivation culture. This means your career is supported by interactive tools, numerous development programs and teammates who want to help you grow. We see value in helping each other be our best and that extends to empowering our employees in their career journeys.


About Thoughtworks

Thoughtworks is a global technology consultancy that integrates strategy, design and engineering to drive digital innovation. For 30+ years, our clients have trusted our autonomous teams to build solutions that look past the obvious. Here, computer science grads come together with seasoned technologists, self-taught developers, midlife career changers and more to learn from and challenge each other. Career journeys flourish with the strength of our cultivation culture, which has won numerous awards around the world. Join Thoughtworks and thrive. Together, our extra curiosity, innovation, passion and dedication overcomes ordinary.
